fieldDescription: If enabled, adds "(E)" to ship's class text, changes the manufacturer of the ship to "Experimental" and adds a fluff paragraph about the manufacturer.
Controls the drill sounds that plays when an experimental hull modification is installed/uninstalled.
If enabled, the base hull modification will have randomized messages about the state of the ship and its upgrades.

Activators can display extra information on their tooltips. "Full" displays extra fields even if there isn't any activated slot shunt. "Partial" limits it to the activated slot shunts. "None" disables these extra fields.
